Text:
IF YOU SEE ANY COMMENTS FROM A PIRATEBAY USER CALLED "tall2daworld"
ON MY TORRENTS TAKE NO NOTICE HE IS A RETARD
when i click Install doesn't start

I have forgotten how bad this game is. Bad camera angles - sometimes can't see where you are going and at some cases you don't know when you are going to fall to the ground. 

People who are starting to play BMX games, pick up Dave Mirra Freestyle BMX because that is more convenient and it has better graphics too.

Really, i found this gameplay much nicer than Dave Mirra and found the soundtrack was better, but to be fair i played a lot of tony hawk and i found the earlier tony hawks transition to this was identical, so if you liked tony hawk games on psx, and got a controller on your pc this is not that bad of a game.
